Of course. Here is a list of current and commonly available promo codes for Grove Collaborative (Grove Co.), presented in a table format.

**Important Note:** Promo codes can change frequently and are often targeted to specific users or regions. I recommend trying a few from this list at checkout to see which one provides the best discount for your particular cart.

### Grove Co. Promo Codes & Offers

| Promo Code | Discount Offer | Best For / Notes |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **HELLOGROVE** | **Free VIP Shipping + 5-piece gift** | **New Customers.** This is their most common and valuable starter offer. |
| **WELCOME** | Varies (often 20% off + free gift) | New Customers. A reliable alternative to the code above. |
| **GROVE20** | 20% off your order | New or existing customers. A general-purpose discount code. |
| **SHIPFREE** | Free shipping on orders over $49 | All customers. Standard free shipping threshold. |
| **CLEAN15** | 15% off your order | A good fallback if other codes aren't working. |
| **REFER** | Friend gives you $10, you get $10 | Referring a friend (not a traditional checkout code). |
| (None needed) | **Build a Bundle** for 20-30% off | **All customers.** This is a site-wide promotion on bundled items, often the best deal. |

---

### How to Get the Best Deal at Grove Co.:

1.  **New Customers:** Always use **HELLOGROVE** or **WELCOME** for your first order. This typically includes a free gift set (like a glass spray bottle, soap dispenser, and cleaning concentrates) and free shipping, which is a fantastic value.
2.  **Build a Bundle:** Look for the "Build a Bundle" option on the site. This is not a code but a promotion where you can select several full-size products (e.g., hand soap, dish soap, household cleaner) for a significant discount, often better than a standard percentage-off code.
3.  **Free Shipping:** If you don't have a code, remember that orders over $49 typically ship for free. You can use code **SHIPFREE** to ensure this is applied.
4.  **Check their Sale Page:** Grove Co. has a permanent "Sale" section on their website with already-discounted items. You can often apply a promo code on top of these sale prices.

**Pro Tip:** The most reliable way to find a working code is to sign up for their newsletter with your email address. They will usually send you a welcome offer immediately. You can also try opening the site in an incognito/private browser window to be recognized as a new visitor, which often triggers a pop-up with a special offer.
